Description: Get access to files anywhere through secure cloud storage and file backup for your photos, videos, files and more with Google Drive.
Name: Google Drive

Methods.Name: List Folders
Methods.Description: List folders in this Google Drive account.

Methods.Name: Search Folders By Name
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of folders containing the input word/s in its name.

Methods.Name: List Sub Folders
Methods.Description: List sub folders in this Google Drive account.

Methods.Name: Share Folder
Methods.Description: Share a folder in Google Drive.

Methods.Name: Create Folder
Methods.Description: Create a folder in Google Drive.

Methods.Name: Delete File
Methods.Description: Permanently deletes a file owned by the user without moving it to the trash.

Methods.Name: List Files
Methods.Description: List all files in this Google Drive account.

Methods.Name: List Files By Folder
Methods.Description: List all files in a folder in this Google Drive account.

Methods.Name: List Updated Files
Methods.Description: List all files in this Google Drive account created or updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Copy File
Methods.Description: Copy a file, it will be copied to the same directory as the source file.

Methods.Name: Search Files By Name
Methods.Description: Retrieve the file, from the given folder, containing the input words in its name.

Methods.Name: Rename File
Methods.Description: Rename a file in Google Drive.

Methods.Name: List Updated Files By Folder
Methods.Description: List all files in a folder in this Google Drive account created or updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Download CSV File
Methods.Description: Downloads a file from drive.

Methods.Name: Download Workspace File
Methods.Description: Downloads a workspace file from drive. This will only work with files that have been created in Drive and the other google apps.

Methods.Name: Download File
Methods.Description: Downloads a file from drive.

Methods.Name: Get File Metadata
Methods.Description: Returns metadata on a file.

Methods.Name: Add Parent
Methods.Description: Add a parent folder to a file, the file will appear in both folders if it already has a parent.

Methods.Name: Remove Parent
Methods.Description: Remove parent folder from the file.

Methods.Name: Upload File
Methods.Description: Upload a file.
